name: Keeling Labs
headline: We develop ML that optimizes how batteries in the grid store energy
description:
Founded in 2022, Keeling Labs was started as a place to develop and apply machine learning to solve the world's biggest problem—climate change. Our current priority is getting the grid to run on 100% clean energy, which is currently limited by battery storage (specifically, the algorithms that control them).

We're redefining these algorithms to unlock gigawatts of untapped energy storage capacity, enabling the grid to run on more clean energy from wind and solar.
tags: industry:energy-storage; industry:reinforcement-learning; industry:climate; industry:energy; industry:climatetech; location:los-angeles

founders.name: Jack O'Grady, Founder
founders.description: I build Reinforcement Learning for energy systems. Currently founding Keeling Labs. Previously at Rivian for 3+ years building battery data science from the ground up, where I ultimately focused on applied AI (RL) for battery optimization in R1T/R1S.

[ Energy Management  ](http://keelinglabs.com/</energy-management>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/cae316f5-a2b8-4315-8d27-fe665d385849/iss067e141215.jpg)
# **Our Work**
### At Keeling Labs, we develop and apply machine learning to solve the world’s biggest problem—climate change.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/453f9d6c-539c-4806-9130-812521861114/keeling_labs_share_image.png)
#### **Self-OptimizingEnergy Storage**
Enabling the grid to run on more clean energy.
We’re creating a model that teaches itself how a battery should optimally charge or discharge in the grid to maximize the usage of clean energy.
[ Learn more ](http://keelinglabs.com/</energy-management>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/19e77470-90e2-4353-8bf7-c170e5536eab/tempImageIvbMIF.jpg)
#### **Energy TradingPilot**
Our first step towards optimizing batteries in the grid.
On our path to developing self-optimizing batteries, we’ve deployed a version of our model to do standalone energy trading in California (CAISO).
[ Learn more ](http://keelinglabs.com/</energy-trading>)
# **Why These Problems?**
### Solving climate change hinges on shifting to a 100% clean electricity grid. Yet, clean sources of energy (like wind and solar) aren’t always on.
**For Starters:** Energy demand peaks in the morning and evening, but clean energy production peaks in the middle of the day.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/9fcaf5ea-db52-4cdc-b994-bdddd8c1d2f9/wind_solar_demand_green_darker.png)
**So What:** This leads to dirtier energy in the morning, evening, and night.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/99f8f7ca-19cb-48d3-8ed4-5da84006a7e8/carbon_intensity.png)
**Solving This:** Simply adding more wind and solar won’t solve this. _We also need energy storage._
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/44775030-fb99-4ccf-a849-9b26487f6d7b/solar_store_green_darker.png)
**The Big Opportunity:** Algorithms control how energy storage works in the grid. To store more clean energy with batteries, we need a better, more adaptable approach for these controls.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/3981a005-ad21-4526-bce5-438b267b4c81/batteries.png)
### **We’re reinventing these algorithms to unlock gigawatts of untapped energy storage capacity.**
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/7a5802a7-3566-4aff-8e62-a591d8482464/tempImagezOyxsA.jpg)
# **Join Our Team**
### We’re a group of engineers and researchers driven by solving climate change with technology.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/f6ac59fb-5161-40e6-b36f-548c48dd8369/ml_real_world_lighter.png)
**Machine Learningfor the Real World**
We deploy our models in the real world to solve real problems. Our work doesn’t end in simulation or in papers.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/7fee8be7-b643-410c-af29-9c7f1e4228ff/learn_icon_black.png)
**Pioneering a New Approach**
We create novel models that use reinforcement learning to continuously adapt to changing scenarios.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/c60d0011-63dd-4d10-bebc-ff6e2aa1f9cc/emissions_reduction.png)
**Directly ReducingCarbon Emissions**
Our work directly controls how clean energy is used to displace carbon emissions in the grid.
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/1709508792405-1UFNCY2HPOYXIGVDEG47/image-asset.jpeg)
#### **Building in Los Angeles**
We’re building an energetic, in-person team in the hard-tech capital of Southern California.
Southern California is an engineering powerhouse for energy, aerospace, and automotive. It also boasts unparalleled access to nature, a thriving city-life, a world-class dining scene, and stellar work-life balance.
[ View Job Board ](http://keelinglabs.com/</jobs>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/636ab376548a7e6815075e62/7d2d607f-914b-40b3-a36b-7dba7c7b7c89/founder_photo_jack_ogrady.jpg)
#### **Massive Action for a Massive Problem**
The scale of the climate problem requires action at an equally massive scale. Learn more about our vision, founding story, and team to tackle this.
Our founder, Jack, giving a talk at a Y Combinator event.
[ About Us ](http://keelinglabs.com/</company>)

generated_description:
### Keeling Labs: Optimizing Energy Storage for a Greener Future

**Company Overview:**
Founded in 2022 and operating out of Los Angeles, Keeling Labs is a budding startup that's part of the Y Combinator Batch W23. The company's mission is clear: harness machine learning (ML) to enhance how batteries in the grid store and release energy, with the ultimate goal of supporting a 100% clean energy grid. With a small team of just three, they are working on monumental solutions in the realm of energy optimization.

**The Problem They Tackle:**
The transition to a clean electricity grid is hampered by the intermittent nature of renewable energy sources like solar and wind. Although these sources are plentiful, their production doesn’t always align with energy demand, which peaks at different times. The result? Increased reliance on fossil fuels during high demand periods. Improving how batteries are controlled—particularly through more adaptive algorithms—could unlock immense storage capacity and keep the grid cleaner.

**What Keeling Labs Does:**
1. **Self-Optimizing Energy Storage:** They are developing models that can self-learn how to optimally charge and discharge batteries within the grid, maximizing the use of available clean energy.
2. **Energy Trading Pilot:** This initial step allows them to test their models in real-world scenarios, aiming to optimize battery usage for energy trading, particularly in California.

**Technical Approach:**
Keeling Labs employs advanced techniques such as reinforcement learning, enabling their algorithms to adapt to changing conditions within the energy ecosystem. This innovative approach aims to displace carbon emissions directly by optimizing how clean energy is utilized.

**Cultural and Impact Vision:**
Keeling Labs isn't just about engineering solutions; they’re about creating a culture driven by the urgency to fight climate change. Their team of engineers and researchers believes that solving this monumental challenge requires continuous, massive action. They also emphasize the importance of real-world application—ensuring their algorithms aren't just theoretical, but deployed in practical scenarios.

**Why Now?**
The climate crisis necessitates immediate action, and Keeling Labs is one of the myriad attempts to make a tangible difference. As technologies evolve and the world pivots away from fossil fuels, optimizing energy storage is a crucial piece of the puzzle. By focusing on the algorithms governing battery operations, they aim to increase the efficiency of renewable energy deployment.

For those interested in the intersection of climate technology and innovative ML solutions, Keeling Labs represents a compelling opportunity for investment, collaboration, or even joining their small but driven team.

**Get Involved:**
To learn more about them or explore career opportunities, visit their website: [Keeling Labs](http://keelinglabs.com).
